description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the ape participants - usually numerical
test period containing different test sessions and which was repeated within 60 days
whether the participant touched the box
whether the participant opened the box
whether the participant ate or tasted a food item
whether the participant rejected the good item in the box
latency in seconds it took participant to touch the box
latency in seconds it took participant to open the box
final data- includes the latencies measured of those that did touch the box/ the latencies of those that did not touch are set to  max of the test time (60 seconds)
final data- includes the latencies measured of those that did open the box/ the latencies of those that did not open are set to  max of the test time (60 seconds)
